name: 流光記憶之灰 Grayscale Memories
name_original: 流光記憶之灰 Grayscale Memories
description:
Can a lonely spirit found where it would belong to?
Story-based short 3D game, with simple control and multiple gameplays,
you can experience the story seamlessly while playing games.
After finishing the main storyline, there are some more challenge levels for you to play.


Player can go through the game with 4 arrow keys on the keyboard by single hand,
relax and play, without worrying about death and failure.

The game is not very long in playtime (Demo version about 10 mins, full-version about 45~60mins),
while developing, we avoided too tiring and repeatedly gameplay or text which is too long.
Suitable for those who don't have many time for playing games and want to change mood.

*This is NOT A HORROR GAME.
